languages.text: "Перейдем к последнему делу на сегодня. Слушается дело ДП-1646/7, леди Моллес-Секандас против покойного лорда Моллеса. Так как лорд Моллес мертв, его интересы представляют потомки — Агарта и Шиллас Моллесы. Представители сторон, предъявите ваши доводы в регламентированном порядке".

"Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."
languages.original_text: "Перейдем к последнему делу на сегодня. Слушается дело ДП-1646/7, леди Моллес-Секандас против покойного лорда Моллеса. Так как лорд Моллес мертв, его интересы представляют потомки — Агарта и Шиллас Моллесы. Представители сторон, предъявите ваши доводы в регламентированном порядке".

Representatives for the plaintiff and the defendant will present their arguments following standard procedure."

Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

languages.text: "Wenden wir uns dem letzten Fall für heute zu. Das Gericht befasst sich nun mit Fall DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas gegen den verstorbenen Lord Molles. Der verstorbene Lord Molles wird von seinen Nachkommen, Agartha und Sjyllas Molles, vertreten. Vertreter beider Parteien werden gemäß dem Standardprozedere ihre Argumente darlegen."
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: "Wenden wir uns dem letzten Fall für heute zu. Das Gericht befasst sich nun mit Fall DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas gegen den verstorbenen Lord Molles. Der verstorbene Lord Molles wird von seinen Nachkommen, Agartha und Sjyllas Molles, vertreten. Vertreter beider Parteien werden gemäß dem Standardprozedere ihre Argumente darlegen."

languages.text: « Passons à la dernière affaire du jour. La cour va maintenant traiter l'affaire DP-1646/7, dame Molles-Secundas contre feu le seigneur Molles. Le seigneur Molles étant décédé, il sera représenté par ses enfants, Agartha et Sjyllas Molles. Les représentants des deux parties exposeront leurs arguments en suivant la procédure habituelle. »
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: « Passons à la dernière affaire du jour. La cour va maintenant traiter l'affaire DP-1646/7, dame Molles-Secundas contre feu le seigneur Molles. Le seigneur Molles étant décédé, il sera représenté par ses enfants, Agartha et Sjyllas Molles. Les représentants des deux parties exposeront leurs arguments en suivant la procédure habituelle. »

languages.text: “接下来，我们来审理今天的最后一个案子。本法庭即将审理DP-1646/7号案件，解决莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人与莫莱斯勋爵之间的纠纷。由于莫莱斯勋爵身故，他的后代阿加莎·塞拉斯与塞拉斯·莫莱斯将代他出庭。双方代表将按照标准程序陈述各自的主张。”
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: “接下来，我们来审理今天的最后一个案子。本法庭即将审理DP-1646/7号案件，解决莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人与莫莱斯勋爵之间的纠纷。由于莫莱斯勋爵身故，他的后代阿加莎·塞拉斯与塞拉斯·莫莱斯将代他出庭。双方代表将按照标准程序陈述各自的主张。”

languages.text: «Pasemos al último caso del día. El tribunal escuchará el caso DP-1646/7: lady Molles-Secundas contra el difunto lord Molles. Puesto que lord Molles está muerto, lo representarán sus descendientes, Agartha y Sjyllas Molles. Los representantes de ambas partes presentarán sus argumentos según el procedimiento estándar».
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: «Pasemos al último caso del día. El tribunal escuchará el caso DP-1646/7: lady Molles-Secundas contra el difunto lord Molles. Puesto que lord Molles está muerto, lo representarán sus descendientes, Agartha y Sjyllas Molles. Los representantes de ambas partes presentarán sus argumentos según el procedimiento estándar».

languages.text: 「本日最後の裁判に移る。これよりDP-1646/7事件、レディ・モレス・セクンダス対故モレス公の訴訟を審理する。モレス公は故人であるため、彼の子孫であるアガルタ・モレスとスジュラス・モレスが代理人を務める。各当事者の代表が通常の手続きに従って弁論を行う」
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: 「本日最後の裁判に移る。これよりDP-1646/7事件、レディ・モレス・セクンダス対故モレス公の訴訟を審理する。モレス公は故人であるため、彼の子孫であるアガルタ・モレスとスジュラス・モレスが代理人を務める。各当事者の代表が通常の手続きに従って弁論を行う」

languages.text: "Günün son davasına geçiyoruz. Mahkeme şimdi Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın, merhum Lord Molles'e karşı açtığı DP-1646/7 sayılı davayı görecektir. Lord Molles, müteveffa olmasından mütevellit evlatları Agartha ve Sjyllas Molles tarafından temsil edilecektir. Tarafların vekilleri, usule uygun olarak iddialarını sunacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Let us move on to the last case for today. The court will now hear Case DP-1646/7, Lady Molles-Secundas against the late Lord Molles. Lord Molles being deceased, he will be represented by his progeny, Agartha and Sjyllas Molles. Representatives for the parties will present their arguments following standard procedure."

traits.locale_text: "Günün son davasına geçiyoruz. Mahkeme şimdi Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın, merhum Lord Molles'e karşı açtığı DP-1646/7 numaralı davayı görecektir. Lord Molles'in müteveffa olmasından mütevellit evlatları Agartha ve Sjyllas Molles tarafından temsil edilecektir. Tarafların vekilleri, usule uygun olarak iddialarını sunacaklardır."
